name: TaskForce (Jens Granseuer)
overview: A tactical combat game for one or two players and editor in the tradition of Act of War. You take control of a group of heavily armed mercenaries and guide them through hell... A mission editor will allow you to design your own favorite arena. Created by Jens Granseuer. Pick one of the 8 built-in combat missions like BG1 Babysitter where you must stop the rebels from capturing or destroying the Beta Gleny Orgital Station.
